price: Wakasema: Hakika wewe ni miongoni mwa walio rogwa.
footnotes: Wakasema: Wewe si chochote isipo kuwa miongoni mwa walio rogwa kikweli mpaka zikapotea akili zao. Na katika jawabu hii mna ukali na usafihi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
